acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.isPrimeAsset: Boolean to add/remove asset from prime program

addOrUpdateDistributionConfigs((uint8,ui.details: Add or update destination targets based on destination address

getPercentageDistribution(address,uint8).details: Used to find out the percentage distribution for a particular destination based on schema

params.destination: the destination address of the distribution target
params.schema: the schema of the distribution target

getUnreleasedFunds(address,uint8,address.details: Used to find out the amount of funds that's going to be released when release funds is called.

params.asset: the asset address which will be released
params.comptroller: the comptroller address of the pool
params.destination: the destination address of the distribution target
params.schema: the schema of the distribution target

params._loopsLimit: Limit for the loops in the contract to avoid DOS

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.assets: assets to be released to distribution targets
params.comptroller: the comptroller address of the pool

removeDistributionConfig(uint8,address).details: Remove destionation target if percentage is 0

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

totalDistributions().details: Returns the total number of distribution targets

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

updateAssetsState(address,address,uint8).details: Update the reserve of the asset for the specific pool after transferring to the protocol share reserve.

MaxLoopsLimitExceeded(uint256,uint256).notice: Thrown an error on maxLoopsLimit exceeds for any loop

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

AssetReleased(address,address,uint8,uint.notice: Event emitted when an asset is released to a target

AssetsReservesUpdated(address,address,ui.notice: Event emitted after the updation of the assets reserves.

DistributionConfigAdded(address,uint8,ui.notice: Event emitted when distribution configuration is added

DistributionConfigRemoved(address,uint8,.notice: Event emitted when distribution configuration is removed

DistributionConfigUpdated(address,uint8,.notice: Event emitted when distribution configuration is updated

MaxLoopsLimitUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when max loops limit is set

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

PoolRegistryUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when pool registry address is updated

PrimeAssetUpdated(address,bool).notice: Emitted when an asset is added to prime program

PrimeUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when prime address is updated

ReservesUpdated(address,address,uint8,ui.notice: Event emitted when asset reserves state is updated

CORE_POOL_COMPTROLLER().notice: address of core pool comptroller contract

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

distributionTargets(uint256).notice: configuration for different income distribution targets
